articles.author: Emily Giambalvo
articles.title: Seven charts that show Indiana’s historic path from doormat to dominance - The Washington Post
articles.description: Few teams in college football history have been so bad before reaching the national title game.
articles.content: For decades, Indiana football meandered through disappointing seasons as a Big Ten bottom-feeder. A gulf separated the Hoosiers from national relevance. Now they are at the sports mountaintop, one wi… [+89 chars]
